3/7 Polygon Miden is an advanced ZK Rollup.   ZK Rollups are very promising, but currently, it's hard for them to support arbitrary logic and transactions, such as those happening on Ethereum.   Polygon Miden will solve this challenge using its core component - Miden VM.

2/ Recommended min gas price is a standard feature in Ethereum-based clients, including Ethereum mainnet clients.  Polygon PoS is a decentralized network, so it is completely up to validators to decide whether they will accept this value or configure their nodes to another value.

9/9 We love working with  and his great team; their energy and understanding of Web3 is impressive!  We are excited about this collaboration and we believe it will take us a step closer to the mass adoption of Polygon technology.  Let's bring the world to Ethereum! 🤗🦄💫

8/9 Apart from Polygon Nightfall, we are collaborating with EY on multiple fronts:  - Integration of Polygon networks with EY blockchain platform; - Creation of privacy-focused enterprise chains based on Nightfall etc.  More details in the official post:  https://t.co/8MYIkJJf17

7/9 Polygon Nightfall will be a great addition to our growing suite, alongside Polygon PoS, Polygon Hermez, Polygon SDK etc.  It also aligns with our recently announced strategic focus on ZK-based solutions.  For all these reasons, we are elated to work with EY on this project.

4/9 Polygon Nightfall is one-of-a-kind, privacy-focused Rollup that effectively combines the major concepts of Optimistic Rollups with Zero-Knowledge (ZK) cryptography commonly used in ZK-Rollups, thus creating a scalable and private hybrid of the two popular technologies.

3/9 The EY team started exploring Ethereum scaling solutions to mitigate these challenges and eventually released Nightfall 3 - the latest, scalable version of Nightfall.  Along the way, the EY team started collaborating with Polygon, and the idea Polygon Nightfall was conceived.

1/9 Another big day for ! 🦄💫  We have started collaboration with EY, a global professional services and technology firm, on building Ethereum scaling and enterprise solutions!  As part of this collaboration, we will work on Polygon Nightfall, a privacy-focused Rollup!  https://t.co/HlJ6drA2kS
